body:
Fixes #22997 @Nandinihpc

### Before

```console
$ spack spec cgal
Input spec
--------------------------------
cgal

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: variant "header_only" not found in package "cgal" [required from package "cgal"]
```

### After

Successful concretization with the new concretizer.
title: cgal: fix concretization
